Charlie The Horse Organic

Need a bag for all the great value gifts you've found? From pocket-friendly foldaway options to jumbo storage bags, we've got reusable shopping bags for gifts of all sizes. Our beautiful bags make great gifts too! Peruse our weekend bags, purses and wallets for gorgeous gift ideas.

Bishop style

Welcome to Bishop London, a quirky, unique treasure trove of gifts and homeware. Bringing you bright, colourful gifts and retro home decor, you’ll find something for everyone - all at incredible prices.
